Description: Portrait of woman on painted plaster mask mounted on linen base.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, pp. 194-195 [145]. Riggs, in Strudwick and Taylor (eds): The Theban Necropolis (2003) [pl.109]. Riggs, Beautiful Burial in Roman Egypt (2005):232-3, 234 Fig. 117, 296-7
Bibliographic references: Parlasca & Seeman 1999 / Augenblicke. Mumienporträts und ägyptische Grabkunst aus römischer Zeit (p.352, no.241)
Riggs 2005 / Beautiful burial in Roman Egypt (no.130, fig.117)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
